comments:
build RC2, Linux-Motif, locale en_US.UTF-8

String out of bounds exception when closing the Preferecen Page.

Steps:
1) Open the Preference Page
2) Go to the Plug-In Development->Target Environment
3) Press Ok -> the dialog won't close

Message in terminal:
Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Reason:
String index out of range: -1

Stacktrace in the .log:
